alert.note: Alert for Camden; Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 7:09PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN AND SOUTHERN MORGAN COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 708 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Versailles, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake of The Ozarks, Village of Four Seasons, Lake Ozark, Laurie, Sunrise Beach, Gravois Mills, Hurricane Deck, Rocky Mount, Barnumton and Purvis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
